BackstoryDef.title: Sole Survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was young when [PAWN_possessive] colony was infested with terrible monsters, surviving by keeping to the vents before being rescued years later by a contingent of glitter world Marines that was sent to investigate the colony.

BackstoryDef.title: Mining Colony Botanist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a partially terraformed mining colony. Both of[PAWN_possessive] parents died working the mines for the company while [PAWN_nameDef] grey up working in agriculture with her adopted brother.

BackstoryDef.title: orphaned dependant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lost [PAWN_possessive] mother on a long haul mission with an interstellar corporation. [PAWN_nameDef] grey up on the employee insurance payout with [PAWN_possessive] stepfather but relations were strained and [PAWN_pronoun] ran away. During [PAWN_possessive] teen years, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a great talent for engineering and used that skill to get by.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate training
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a training program in a interstellar corporation.[PAWN_possessive] aptitude was tested on knowledge of art, etiquette and scientific research.

BackstoryDef.title: officer cadet
BackstoryDef.description: From a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] trained to be a special operative. [PAWN_pronoun] enrolled in a Defense College when [PAWN_pronoun] was a boy and became proficient with a range of weapons and survival techniques.
